snippet.title: Matchmaking Inc. is Now Available | True Love Awaits, No More Delays!
snippet.description:
Hello, players! Thank you for your continued attention and support. After more than two years of development, our game is finally live!

This is a multi-ending role-playing game that combines dating simulation, management, and card gameplay. In the game, you’ll experience:
- A first-person preview of authentic matchmaking, witnessing uniquely Chinese marriage and love stories unfold
- A full relationship journey with various female leads, from meeting and getting to know each other to proposing, registering your marriage, and even hosting the wedding
- Over 10 unique real-life dating scenarios, each filled with surprises and challenges
- A cyber matchmaking hub, where unexpected surprises await
- Card battles to mediate matches online
- Exploring a vast world, uncovering the intricate lives of NPCs

The launch discount is only ¥39.1! The discount lasts for 14 days – we look forward to your feedback!
We have also prepared a monthly update plan, which will be continuously optimized and updated in the future. English localization will be supported in 2025.
For bug reports and suggestions, please email us at minnie@lightning.games, including your save file and a description of the issue. We’ll get back to you as soon as possible!

Play it on Steam NOW:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2103130
